ValidationRule.description: Reportable Incident Cases cannot be closed before Approval
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ReportableIncident', ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'), IF(IsApprovalRequired__c = TRUE, ISBLANK( ApprovedDate__c ), FALSE) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are closing case that requires approval - please submit for approval before closing
